alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Lincoln; Moore (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 22 at 8:36PM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Jackson, northeastern Madison, south central Moore, southeastern Lincoln and Franklin Counties through 915 PM CST... At 836 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Sewanee to 8 miles southeast of Huntland to near New Market. Movement was east at 70 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Winchester, Bridgeport, Meridianville, Moores Mill, Hazel Green, Decherd, Estill Springs, Stevenson, Cowan and Huntland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CST for north central and northeastern Alabama.
